mapper.insert: insert into task (String username, String status, String paramschange, String flopschange, String accchange, String losschange, String prunedpath, String structureafterpruned, String logpath, String totepoch, String currentepoch, String script) values (#{username}, #{status}, #{paramschange}, #{flopschange}, #{accchange}, #{losschange}, #{prunedpath}, #{structureafterpruned}, #{logpath}, #{totepoch}, #{currentepoch}, #{script});
